Ignatius stood up and stared at his statuesque prisoners. "Trainer circuitr=
y" he commented "I'll bet you wish you had some." Like the overconfident ca=
ptor he gloated walking up, glareing eye to eye with Drillbit. It was a bad=
 mistake as the Predacons eyebeams fired. 

"AHHHHH!!!" He yelled as the bo=
ts eye beams took a chunk out of his left cheek. He recovered enraged, he h=
eld his talons to the sides of Drillbits head. "How about if I return the f=
avor?"

Hallucinagens mindtricks came into play. In Ignatius'  mind he fire=
d a missle at Drillbits head and missed, striking the coolant line to the m=
ain computer. without coolant the base would explode. "Look what you made m=
e do!!" he shouted continuously not knowing that the others couldn't see a =
thing.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 12:08 PM
  Subject: Re=

  :::The Destrocons::: 

  ::They would have screame=
d if they had the movement capacity to do so, but 
  since they didn't all =
three of their brains were drowned in a state of fear 
  and confusion.  Bu=
t soon anger started setting in.  All of them were thinking 
  that if they=
 ever got out of this, the Trainers would die slow and painful 
  deaths:: =
